item.title: Linear Equations
item.description: Linear Equations # \[x = A^{-1} \cdot b\] Example A # \[\tag{a.1} x + 2y = 5\] \[\tag{a.2} 3x + 4y = 6\] \[\tag{a.3} A = \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4 \end{pmatrix} \quad b = \begin{pmatrix} 5 \\ 6 \end{pmatrix}\] \[\tag{a.4} x = \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4 \end{pmatrix}^{-1} \cdot \begin{pmatrix} 5 \\ 6 \end{pmatrix}\] Python Solution # import numpy as np import numpy.

item.title: Wave Digital Filters
